system.description: The character's presence is anathema to creatures of the warp, causing them to struggle to maintain their hold on reality.
system.benefit: Whenever a creature with the Warp Instability Trait makes a successful attack against the character, it must immediately test for Warp Instability after resolving the attack.

prerequisites.text: Tier 3: Bane of the Daemon, Willpower 50, Untouchable Elite Advance

specialAbilities.name: Daemonic Disruption
specialAbilities.description: Whenever a creature with the Warp Instability Trait makes a successful attack against you, it must immediately test for Warp Instability after resolving the attack.
